<denchmark-link:https://github.com/Danishzulfquar>@Danishzulfquar</denchmark-link>
In order to expedite the trouble-shooting process, could you please provide the TensorFlow version, the complete code to reproduce the issue and the dataset you are using. Also if you're using a GPU, try limiting GPU memory growth as per <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/gpu#limiting_gpu_memory_growth>this guide</denchmark-link> and let us know if it helps. You may also refer to these links and et us know, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/44118#issuecomment-714287471>link</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/42257>link1</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/41888>link2</denchmark-link>
Thanks!
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you.
Closing as stale. Please reopen if you'd like to work on this further.
